title: Pharmaceutical companies tell Congress they expect coronavirus vaccine profits
author: Leandra Bernstein
description: The U. S. government has invested billions of taxpayer dollars into the development of coronavirus vaccines. On Tuesday, some of the top pharmaceutical companies told Congress that they intended to turn a profit on the most sought-after medical breakthrough. In a hearing of the House Energy and Commerce Committee, the leaders of five biopharmaceutical companies described their race to develop a safe and effective vaccine for COVID-19 on an accelerated timeline.
